articles.title: Anniv. of 250-mile journey made by President commemorated
articles.content:
FM meets new Vietnamese ambassador 
     Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today met and conversed with Do Thi Hoa, new ambassador of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him.
